title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our growing team. You'll work on cutting-edge web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. This role offers excellent growth opportunities and the chance to work on innovative projects that impact thousands of users.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Experience with AWS, Docker, and agile development practices. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative environment.

title: Frontend React Developer
description: Join our dynamic team as a Frontend Developer working on next-generation AI-powered applications. You'll be responsible for creating intuitive user interfaces and ensuring excellent user experiences across our product suite.
requirements: 3+ years of React experience, proficiency in TypeScript, experience with state management libraries (Redux/Zustand), knowledge of modern CSS and responsive design principles.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product strategy and development for our digital transformation initiatives. Work closely with engineering, design, and business teams to deliver products that drive business value and customer satisfaction.
requirements: 5+ years of product management experience, preferably in B2B software. Strong analytical skills, experience with agile methodologies, and excellent communication abilities.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Create beautiful and functional user experiences for our enterprise software solutions. Collaborate with product and engineering teams to design intuitive interfaces that solve complex business problems.
requirements: 4+ years of UX/UI design experience, proficiency in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite, experience with design systems, user research, and usability testing.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Build and maintain our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines. Help scale our systems to handle growing user demand while maintaining high reliability and security standards.
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps experience, expertise in AWS/GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code (Terraform/CloudFormation).

title: Data Scientist
description: Apply machine learning and statistical analysis to solve complex business problems. Work with large datasets to derive insights that drive strategic decision-making across the organization.
requirements: PhD or Master's in Data Science, Statistics, or related field. 4+ years of experience with Python, R, SQL, and machine learning frameworks. Experience with big data technologies preferred.

title: Junior Software Developer
description: Start your career in software development with our mentorship-focused program. Work on real projects while learning from experienced developers in a supportive environment.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, basic knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and either React or Angular. Internship or project experience preferred.

title: Marketing Manager
description: Lead our digital marketing initiatives and help grow our brand presence in the AI/ML space. Develop and execute marketing campaigns that drive lead generation and customer acquisition.
requirements: 5+ years of B2B marketing experience, preferably in technology sector. Experience with digital marketing, content creation, marketing automation, and analytics.
